      • moshi

        public final T moshi(Moshi moshi)
        Adds a moshi instance to build on top.

        DISCLAIMER: This will extract all custom adapter factories declared in the provided instance and create a builder to which internal declared factories will be added. Keep in mind that for Moshi the order of custom factories maters and the resulting object will favor factories from the provided moshi, which can brake expected behaviour. This means that by adding your own Moshi you may override adapters declared internally by XingApi, but you should do that at your own risk.

        NOTE: This method can be called only once, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the internal builder was already initialized.

      • callbackExecutor

        public final T callbackExecutor(java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor)
        Sets the executor which will determine the thread on which callback will be invoked.
